testCase.name: AuthGuard user not signed in should redirect to login
AuthGuard user signed in should redirect to login
AppComponent should render the app
AppComponent should display login page
AppComponent isLoggedIn should return false if no token
AppComponent isLoggedIn should return true if token
LoginGuard user not signed in should redirect to login
LoginGuard user signed in should redirect to home page
HttpInterceptor should be created
HttpInterceptor should add content type to request
HttpInterceptor should add access token to request if present
HttpInterceptor should refresh token if initial request responded with 401
CarDataService should fetch all cars
CarDataService should fetch a car by its id
CarDataService should fetch car within time range
CarCardComponent should render the component
CarCardComponent should emit the car when select car is called
ToastComponent should render the component
ModalComponent should render the component
ModalComponent should dismiss the modal on close button click with the reason canceled
ModalComponent should dismiss the modal on cancel button click with the reason canceled
ModalComponent should close the modal on confirm button click with the reason confirmed
RegisterComponent should render the component
RegisterComponent form is not valid should not submit register
RegisterComponent form is valid should enable register button when all fields are correctly set
RegisterComponent form is valid should submit register
RegisterComponent form is valid should call the remove all method from the toast service
RegisterComponent form is valid should navigate to the login page and show a success toast
RegisterComponent form is valid should show a toast with the error message
HeaderComponent should render the component
HeaderComponent should navigate to the correct routes
HeaderComponent should log the user out
HeaderComponent should change the collapsed property of the navbar
CatalogComponent should render the component
CatalogComponent should navigate to the catalog details page when a car selection is emitted
CatalogDetailsComponent should render the component
CatalogDetailsComponent should get the carId
CatalogDetailsComponent should set the car
CatalogDetailsComponent should set the start date
CatalogDetailsComponent should set the end date
CatalogDetailsComponent should return 0 if the start date or the end date are not set
CatalogDetailsComponent should return the total price in USD if the currency is set to original
CatalogDetailsComponent should return the total price
CatalogDetailsComponent should set the currency
CatalogDetailsComponent should set the price according to the currency
CatalogDetailsComponent should check if the dates are valid
CatalogDetailsComponent should convert NgbDate to Date
CatalogDetailsComponent should calculate the difference between two dates
CatalogDetailsComponent bookCar should show a error toast if the dates are not valid
CatalogDetailsComponent bookCar should check if the dates are valid
CatalogDetailsComponent bookCar should book a car
CatalogDetailsComponent bookCar should show a error toast if the booking fails
BookingComponent should render the component
BookingComponent should set the bookings to the fetched bookings
BookingComponent should filter the bookings according to their status
BookingComponent should cancel the booking
BookingComponent should display an error toast if the cancellation was not successfull
LandingPageComponent should render the component
LandingPageComponent should create
LandingPageComponent should route to catalog with queryParams
LandingPageComponent should not route to catalog when date range is invalid
LandingPageComponent should check if the dates are valid
DatePickerComponent should render the component
DatePickerComponent onDateSelection should set the fromDate to the date and emit it if the fromDate and the toDate are null
DatePickerComponent onDateSelection should set the toDate to the date and emit the endDate
DatePickerComponent onDateSelection should set the fromDate to the date and emit the startDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isInside to true if the toDate is defined and is inside the possible range
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isHovered to false if the date is after the fromDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isHovered to true if fromDate is defined, toDate is false, hoverDate is defined, the date is after fromDate and before hoverDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isRange to true if the date is equal to fromDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isRange to false if all conditions are not met
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isRange to true if the date is equal to toDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should set isInside to false if the toDate is defined but is outside the possible range
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should validate and parse the date and return the input as a NgbDate
DatePickerComponent date picker properties should validate and parse the date and return the currentValue
BookingDataService should fetch all cars
BookingDataService should create a booking
BookingDataService should cancel a booking
AuthService should send an auth request to the backend
AuthService should send register request to backend
AuthService should refresh access token with refresh token
NotFoundComponent should create
NotFoundComponent should render the component
BookingCardComponent should render the component with an expired booking
BookingCardComponent should render the component with an active booking
BookingCardComponent should render the component with an pending booking
BookingCardComponent should return correct amount of days
BookingCardComponent should return zero if booking not defined
BookingCardComponent should open the modal
BookingCardComponent should emit the booking on confirmation
BookingCardComponent should show an error toast if the modal was canceled
StorageService should be created
StorageService should save auth response to session storage
StorageService should retrieve authentication when present
MapsComponent should create
ToastService should push a toast to the toasts array
ToastService should remove a toast from array
ToastService should remove all toasts from array
ToastService should show a success toast
ToastService should show an error toast
ToastService should show an error toast with default message
CurrencyService should fetch all currencies
CurrencyService should convert currency
LoginComponent should render the component
LoginComponent should display login button
LoginComponent should enable login button when username and password is set
LoginComponent should not enable login button when only username is set
LoginComponent form is invalid should return invalid login form if username is empty
LoginComponent form is invalid should return invalid login form if password is not set
LoginComponent form is invalid should not call login method when login button is clicked
LoginComponent form is valid should return valid login form if username is set
LoginComponent form is valid should return valid login form if password is set
LoginComponent form is valid should call login method when login button is clicked
LoginComponent form is valid should call the remove all method from the toast service in submit login
LoginComponent form is valid should save the token in the storage service
LoginComponent form is valid should navigate to the home page and show a success toast
LoginComponent form is valid should show a toast with the error message
